word: "Brethren, if any of you do err from the truth, and one convert him; let him know, that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death, and shall hide a multitude of sins" [James 5:19, 20]. "Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed" [James 5:16].
